website_summaries.verdict: A general home radon test kit focused on radon mitigation in addition to measurement.
pros: Easy and quick to set up for home testing in a single sitting
Generally has fast test results from a lab with excellent customer service and communication
cons: The inside temperature should be at an ideal 70 degrees for the best results

customer_reviews.title: IMO this is worth the extra cost over other similar kits
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these and one First Alert RD1 Radon test since they are relatively cheap (compared to the cost of unneeded mitigation) and something that can get screwed up easily (aka) redundancy. The price difference appears significant but when you consider the AccuStar includes return shipping cost (the First Allert cost $10 to ship through UPS as they recommend) and the AccuStar is a nice tin test kit and the First Alert is the cheapest plastic / paper piece the reason for the price difference is obvious. I mailed off both kits Tuesday afternoon and got the AccuStar results via email Friday. Still waiting on the First Alert. With these two you are getting what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Bret Hollingsworth

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service @ the lab
customer_reviews.text: Initially the report emailed to me said I couldn't get a test result because I had kept the test running for 96 hours and 7 minutes or 0.0012% too long. That annoyed me quite a bit and I was in a bad mood for unrelated reasons. The test is already not particularly accurate and 7 minutes isn't going to matter. So I immediately responded to the email address of the lab with a one sentence rant telling them to go friend themselves and so on. Not my finest moment. I promptly got a response back offering to calculate the results for 96 hours with no passive aggressive digs at my bad attitude. The next morning I had results.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it highly as a way to initially check for ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly. Was followed up by a Radon technician with a computer and the reading was within the same range. I recommend it highly as a way to initially check for radon. Just be sure to follow the directions carefully or the reading could be incorrect.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Decker

customer_reviews.title: Timing is critical, use overnight mail.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 2 pack to test 2 different properties. The first kit I used was rejected by the lab, because regular priority mail did not get the sample to the lab within the very tight time frame required (read the fine print on the paperwork). I used overnight mail for the second sample and got a prompt reply. The concentration reported by the lab was a tad higher than the level obtained by the remediation contractor before they started work, but not different enough to change the need for remediation.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel M. Grossinger

customer_reviews.title: Complete waste of $30
customer_reviews.text: Followed all instructions. Sent AccuStar sample in for analysis two months ago. NEVER received a report!!!
customer_reviews.author: Runner70

customer_reviews.title: Good experience
customer_reviews.text: Good packaging and shipping both to me and back for analysis. The results were posted quickly. I used another brand at the same time and location to have a cross check of the accuracy, both indicated the same result. Overall happy, would use this product again.
customer_reviews.author: John W

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the job!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to conduct the test and the results came back quickly using the free mail in package. Others might be cheaper but beware because then you often have to pay shipping or a fee to get the results back. This is all included in the one price and very easy!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Five

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I've bought several different test kits and this one by far is the best made and most consistent results. I've used 4 different brands and have tested same location several times. I was curious if I would get same results from the different brands and the same results from the same brand. With others like First Alert and Health Metric I found big variation in results. Accustar has been consistent. I highly recommend Accustar.
customer_reviews.author: E. A. C.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Gave me a reading of 384 pCi/L with 48 hour exposure. I retested with another brand, 1-upstairs / 1- downstairs, and got 30 & 38 pCi/L respectively. I recommend radon@alphaenergylabs.com, 1/2 the price of AccuStar but you have to pay for the UPS return for testing.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Easy test and very quick response
customer_reviews.text: Easy test and very quick response. The secret is to follow the instructions and mail on a day when the post office is picking up!
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Agrees with professional measurments
customer_reviews.text: This product measured 7 pirate-ninjas and the official test came back at around 8 pirate-ninjas. That is accurate enough for our decision-making process. Without this product, I would have gone on for years thinking that the mitigation system in our basement was functioning properly.
customer_reviews.author: Naptown

customer_reviews.title: Great option if you are on the fence about getting a professional to check your Radon levels.
customer_reviews.text: Worked exactly as intended. Had this test done found out I had a high radon level of 18. That made me call a professional just too double check that I didn’t get a false reading. His showed an average of 16.6 however time to time his showed mine got as high at 22. Glad I bought this cheap test. Otherwise I don’t think I would have bothered getting a professional.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to do with fast results
customer_reviews.text: Follow the instructions, mail it in (with prepaid label), and get results emailed to you. That's it. I happen to live fairly close to the lab. Mailed in canister on Saturday morning and got result via email on Monday AM. Good product and service.
customer_reviews.author: June Kim

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCT AS PROMISED
customer_reviews.text: Product was very easy to use; instructions very clear; lab results were quick. Can't comment on accuracy, as I did not double check the lab results. Overall, product was as promised
customer_reviews.author: jodie45

customer_reviews.title: Fast service with clear guidance
customer_reviews.text: Read the guide thoroughly before opening the canister. Place the canister as directed and mail it out as directed. It's fool proof unless you don't read the guide. I got my results back very quickly via USPS.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this radon test kit
customer_reviews.text: This is not a cheap test kit but the measurement of radon gas in your home is very important and worth the investment. The kit and instructions are very manageable and the return of test results quick and credible. Return postage is included and the return mailer very well constructed. I highly recommend this radon test kit.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick .

customer_reviews.title: Nice container, prepaid shipping label, no problems
customer_reviews.text: This worked well, no funny business with the prepaid envelope, got the results in the mail in about a week.
customer_reviews.author: Brock Tice

customer_reviews.title: I think this is a very good product. Of course
customer_reviews.text: I was very careful to follow the instructions exactly. I mailed the tester in as instructed and got my test results promptly. I think this is a very good product. Of course, I have no way to personally evaluate the accuracy of the result without having my own lab!
customer_reviews.author: Baker Jay

customer_reviews.title: Rip Off
customer_reviews.text: They would not send results because " The invalid result is because the test ran over 96 hours by 3 mins." I asked for an "amended" for which I was to expect a delay. That was a month ago. I think they love to come up with reasons not to send reports.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best. Affordable. Easy to use. Free shipping back to lab. Results emailed to you. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Circlesthewagon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and mail in
customer_reviews.text: GAve a reading but you must do a second test with a different manufacturer to see if reading match.
customer_reviews.author: Major Strees

customer_reviews.title: Radon Test Kit review
customer_reviews.text: I bought the AcuStar Activated Charcoal Radon Test Kit to check on the radon level at our home's basement. If you live in an area prone to high radon levels this easy to set up kit will give you that information when you send it in to AcuStar to have it analyzed.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Senior

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: Mail delivery was delayed by 2 months! There is a problem with their lab system.
customer_reviews.author: JFF

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Never received results.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Giving poor review as I never received results back. So pointless.
customer_reviews.author: Dan McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Not a do it yourself test
customer_reviews.text: They conveniently don’t let you know if you live in the 3 most popular states in the country that you cannot do this yourself, they won’t test it unles you get someone certified to place this container in your basement, who knows if these people charge to come place the canister you bought in your own basement
customer_reviews.author: Melissa D

customer_reviews.title: Good test
customer_reviews.text: This is a good long term test if you think you may have radon.
customer_reviews.author: schlabow

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: do not buy this item i got my results from August in October because I had to call them and they said my results were inconclusive because it took a week for them to get it back waste of money
customer_reviews.author: JAMES BASLI

customer_reviews.title: Easy and useful
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to do a second test to make sure the first one done by a different company was not a false positive. Results were similar. Test was easy to use and got the results back quickly as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret A Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Important for home buying
customer_reviews.text: I liked the clear directions and ease. I did the test which was a savings vs. having the home inspector perform the test. Got the test results online exactly when I was told they would be available.
customer_reviews.author: Burgundy30

customer_reviews.title: Stop procrastinating and get it done. Its so easy!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to do. Open the canister for 2 days then send it in the included envelope to the lab that is included in the price. Results emailed to you in less than 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Janine Miller

customer_reviews.title: This product was very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This product was very easy to use. The directions were excellent and there really was no "guess work" involved. I sent the canister off to AccuStar and I had the results via email in a week. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: chocolabmom

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Worked for us, probably extended our lives. Had pretty high levels. Purchased long and short term to verify reading. Rechecked. Mitigated problem 😊
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Super responsive, everything happened as advertised or better!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it on Friday, had it on Sunday, dropped it off at the Post Office on Tuesday and had the results via email on Thursday. I found out I needed mitigation and am on the way to getting that done. I am so glad I ordered this product!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bill

customer_reviews.title: Very quick and prompt results.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and setup. Just send it back after the test (I used UPS). The results came back through email in 4 days.
customer_reviews.author: SYOTW

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and quick results
customer_reviews.text: Return shipping label included. Saved us money as the shipping on first alert radon test was not included.
customer_reviews.author: danielle

customer_reviews.title: Hire a professional instead!
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions to a tee and they sent a letter back the next week and said the test was inconclusive. Waste of money and time. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: maryjo turner

customer_reviews.title: Consumer Reports top pick
customer_reviews.text: Consumer Repts recommends this as an accurate, affordable, and simple way to test for radon. It is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Received No Report
customer_reviews.text: Followed instructions, sent in test kit. Received no report. Contacted vendor after 6 weeks and was told to look up results on their web site. No luck with that either. Will get test kit from someone else and try again.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Accurate, and timely results
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to test whether or not a mitigation system in a house I purchased about a year ago is working, just for the peace of mind. Clear instructions, timely results, and shipping box/label is included, which is great!
customer_reviews.author: Mr_Thornton

customer_reviews.title: I never got my test results back from Accustar. $140 wasted on five tests.
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased a used home and followed all instructions to use this product. I the test off for test lab results. And I never got the results. So what good is it? Are used five of them and see what read the instructions thoroughly and sent off all barcodes attached to the paperwork
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I didn't receive an email with the results, but I went online and it was very easy to get the results from the website.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Noble

customer_reviews.title: Quality test kit, results emailed quickly
customer_reviews.text: Very quick turnaround on the kit. We mailed the test kit on a weekend and had the results emailed by the next week.
customer_reviews.author: C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and response time was excellent. Will definitely be getting another for testing next year.
customer_reviews.author: Lorrie Ulfers

customer_reviews.title: Know your radon levels!
customer_reviews.text: This worked well & was used as follow up to Radon mitigation.
customer_reviews.author: TJenkins

customer_reviews.title: Take the test
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I had a radon problem, then I did the test. I was so glad I did. It was so easy and so accurate. I got a radon system and retested. My house is no longer killing me!
customer_reviews.author: My Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: worked well. Gave us reading that show radon. Had it mitigated and new one showed less than .4
customer_reviews.author: Stanley E. Herzog

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: We sent the results in (after following instructions). Results came fairly quickly. We had a little radon but not enough to worry about, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: As far as I knnnow it worked sell I received ...
customer_reviews.text: As far as I knnnow it worked sell I received the test results the same day as the lab received the container.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick results and easy testing process
customer_reviews.text: This arrived quickly and was easy to set up, just read the instructions. I waited two days as instructed and sent the package off. I got the results in less than a week.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use test
customer_reviews.text: This radon test was easy to use and the mailed back results were quick! Thanks :)
customer_reviews.author: James Blake

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Not complicated. Easy to deploy and return with enclosed packaging. Results came quickly, too.
customer_reviews.author: Zombieguy

customer_reviews.title: No instructions or return shipping
customer_reviews.text: this item arrived without instructions. luckily I complied with the requirements until I was able to find instructions on my own (accustar never replied to my request for help) and ship the test back. I recommend the short-term plastic tube tests that come with free return shipping - buy directly from accustar for $25 total. No need for this test that costs more.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Goodberg

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I did everything it said to do, but recieved a message back that said my test was unreadable.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Cauley

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Took a long time to get result. Had to call two times.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Wilkendorf

customer_reviews.title: Just as described. Got fast results from the test ...
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. Got fast results from the test sent back to my home as expected!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Radon test kit
customer_reviews.text: Received canister in 2 days in process of testing. Used their tast kit in the past and received test results within a week
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good set of instructions, quality mail back pkg. & a quick analysis! Highly recommended....
customer_reviews.author: John C. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great and the price included postage and test results.
customer_reviews.author: Bright and breezy

customer_reviews.title: Was relatively easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Was relatively easy to use, submit and get my results back. Not as quickly as I would like but good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Kadoch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up. Quick results. Just need to download different paperwork because live in NJ
customer_reviews.author: darren m

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Most accurate Radon Test on the market with the lab providing fast results.
customer_reviews.author: steve w. grimes

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: The process of testing was super easy and straightforward and I was able to get my results quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked as expected. Results came back within a few days of sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy to use; results came by email within 2 wks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got the results back within a few days as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Kendelski

customer_reviews.title: Try another vendor!
customer_reviews.text: The form required for submission with sample is outdated. You will be forced to send additional data costing you $25. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its better to pay the little extra and purchase an electronic
customer_reviews.text: Product states shipping and results are included but when you read the instructions it recomends fedex 2 day shipping and requests $10 admin fee. Its better to pay the little extra and purchase an electronic tester
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Toye

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: We completed the test, sent the package and never heard any results! There went $30 for nothing!
customer_reviews.author: Janet K Ross

customer_reviews.title: Old but Reliable Test Kit
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about a Charcoal Radon Test Kit other than this is the same product used by some home inspector. Some home inspectors have gone to computer / digital readers but as long as this is done properly, it's just a reliable. The difference is the computers can tell if a window or door was open during the test and the canister do not. I brought a new home and had 30 days to test, so this was perfect for me since I controlled the environment of the home during the test.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Morella

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The test was simple to administer and I received my results by email very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Very bad experience  - do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I had a very bad experience with with shipping back and getting test results. A new user should do their research prior to buying. I did not listen to other reviews and wasted my money as a result.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: No directions sent now return label, absolutely no information ...
customer_reviews.text: No directions sent now return label, absolutely no information on what to do at all, I had to search out Acustar on the web and hope I sent it to the right address. If you order it from Acustar website there’s has a return envelope and directions on what to do. Very dissatisfied with the lack of information sent which will probably cause inaccurate results if I even get the test results even come back.
customer_reviews.author: Splice

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Fast Results!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I smelled radon in my house and wanted it to get checked out. No radon according to this test but I had a hemorrhoid the size of a small car. Whoa! Luckily I have insurance.
customer_reviews.author: Dingo The Pet Berry Tree Hunter

product_meta.title: Radon Gas Test Kit AccuStar Charcoal Short Term 48-96 Hour Test
feature_bullets: Easy-to-use device with fast test results
Used to screen home for levels of Radon Gas
Accurate test kits from AccuStar provide certified results
Ideal for assessing the performance of a Radon Mitigation system
Ideal for assessing the performance of a Radon Mitigation system
